name: Gtk
body:
## All-in-one Places

A desktop menu based on the Gnome Classic Places Menu with a few extra goodies and configuration options to change the look & feel of the applet with versions for Linux Mint Cinnamon and Gnome Shell.

* Show or hide the sections that better fits your needs.
* Choose between normal or collapsable menus to save vertical screen space.
* Trash menu item with "empty trash" option.
* Devices menu items with "eject/unmount" option.

### for Cinnamon

Visit the [wiki page](https://github.com/jferrao/gtk/wiki/Cinnamon-All-in-one-Places) for more information on the applet and how to install it.

If you just want to customize your applet, visit the [configuration options page](https://github.com/jferrao/gtk/wiki/Cinnamon-All-in-one-Places-Options).

Applet page [@ Cinnamon](http://cinnamon-spices.linuxmint.com/applets/view/62)

### for Gnome Shell

Visit the [wiki page](https://github.com/jferrao/gtk/wiki/Gnome-Shell-All-in-one-Places) for more information on the extension and how to install it.

If you just want to customize your extension, visit the [configuration options page](https://github.com/jferrao/gtk/wiki/Gnome-Shell-All-in-one-Places-options).

Extension page [@ Gnome](https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/299/all-in-one-places/)

## Support and feedback ?

If you want to report an bug or some issue and have a GitHub account you may use the [project's issues page](https://github.com/jferrao/gtk/issues), if not you may use each's version project page on [Cinnamon](http://cinnamon-spices.linuxmint.com/applets/view/62) or [Gnome](https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/299/all-in-one-places/) for feedback or email me to jferrao@ymail.com.

## Want to fork or clone this project ?

[Fork it!](http://help.github.com/fork-a-repo/) Clone it!
```
git clone git@github.com:jferrao/gtk.git
```

## More stuff ?

@jferrao
